entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
